New Records: Moeen Ali hit the fastest half-century in T20 internationals by an England captain
Key Match Events: Moeen Ali's 28-ball 63 was instrumental in hauling the tourists to a competitive total
Moeen dismissed both openers in successive overs
Chris Jordan and Reece Topley finished the job with admirable death bowling
Pre-Game Insights: Moeen Ali blamed England's defeat in the third match on having to bowl eight overs of heavily punished spin
Post-Match Reflections: Moeen Ali said he was'really happy' to contribute to keeping the series alive
Moeen felt he underbowled himself in the previous game and took the opportunity to have a go
Miscellaneous Highlights: England won by 34 runs to level the series
The match was a morale-boosting win for England
Adil Rashid, Liam Livingstone, and Moeen Ali spun the team to victory
